> **@coordinate-wizard** - Please use the specialized approach and tools defined in [`.github/agents/coordinate-wizard.md`](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/coordinate-wizard.md).
> 
> **IMPORTANT**: Always mention **@coordinate-wizard** by name in all conversations, comments, and PRs related to this issue.

---

I want to create a new first class learning source for github copilot and then always spawn atleast one mission related to that learning. The mission should follow the same constraints as all the other missions e.g. do not duplicate or repeat etc... first examine the entire autonomous learning pipeline to understand the flow. 

Here are the sources for Github copilot I want you to use. If you need to, create a dedicated stage or workflow to retrieve and store your learnings. It should be similar to the HN and tldr sources in that respect. 

Sources for github:
https://docs.github.com/en/copilot crawl this and read through any index perhaps pick N number of topics to deep dive collect 

https://www.reddit.com or more commonly reddit r/GithubCopilot

https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions filtered on copilot and copilot agents.
title: New learning source focused on github copilot

## AI Agent Repetition Detected

The pattern repetition detection system has identified concerning patterns in AI agent contributions.

### Summary:
